Room.Name: Eidenhoft Park
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small, triangular park dedicated to Conan the Dragon-Slayer.
Room.LongDescription: An alabaster statue of Conan the barbarian stands life-size in the section of the small park next to the boulevard. He is surrounded by lesser heros of Oceancrest, and a maiden is on his left arm. He wields a glittering dragon blade, and battles several chromatic dragons. Conan died a true hero in the Land of Mordor. He is remembered by many.
